channel.title: Look! how to start a server for newbies!
channel.description:
OK ima try and tel you how to start your very own server that you can play yourself or whatever
first you need java and java dev kit(JDK) im not going into this because there are a few stickes on how to do it!!
first download warscape: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,11610.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,11610.0.html[/url]
now extract it with winrar (www.rarlabs.com) if you do not have it...
go to run.bat or run and compile.bat or whatever
when you get the box that says "starting _____ server on __" or whatever that means you have a running server.
so now open up moparscape and use the IP 127.0.0.1 and log in with any username and pass and you server should be running.
If you need help post, if you need commands look at the link for warscape on it the maker posted the commands, if you get the error Â¨"java is not a recogised... blah blah" then install java!!!!! ok?Â¿? i think this is pretty easyy !! setting classpaths when installing java can be a little dificult but when its installed its worth it!
erp me or watever iff you find trhis usefull lol
